markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs=""
>
[Command Corpse](/Feats.aspx?ID=3884) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Corpse Tender](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=196)

**Prerequisites**
[Corpse Tender Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3883)

</column>

---

You gain the [Command Undead](/Feats.aspx?ID=277) feat, but you can use it only to transform the effects of _harm_ spells you cast on [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). These spells can control creatures with a level equal to or lower than your level – 1 (instead of your level – 3).

<title level="2">Command Corpse leads to...</title>
[Imbue Mindlessness](/Feats.aspx?ID=3887), [Improved Command Corpse](/Feats.aspx?ID=3886)
name: Command Corpse
